title: Loveandpizza.it: A romantic adventure in Naples, Italy
description: Daniela's debut novel, "Loveandpizza.it" is a romantic comedy, perfect for the chick lit aficionados. If you are a fan of Marian Keyes, Katie Fforde, Jill Mansell, Sophie Kinsella (the "Shopaholic" series), Jojo Moyes ("Me Before You", which will be in the cinemas soon), Jane Green, Maeve Binchy, - then this book is for you!Are you passionate about all things Italian (Italian food, Italian language, Italian culture), or perhaps you are going to spend holidays (or even a quick visit) in Naples? If you are, this book is also for you, and you can find Naples sightseeing tips (yes, a different Naples travel guide), including Capri, Pompeii, Ercolano and the great Vesuvius. There are also some insights on the Neapolitan mafia, the Camorra (Gomorrah in book and series).
author: Daniela Pesconi-Arthur
